task_background: Prepare the professional recording studio for an upcoming recording session by setting up and repairing audio equipment.

tasks.task_description: Place the gold_records_1 on the neve_mixing_console_1.
Find the black, Universal Audio branded tube preamp and place it on the gear_rack_1.
Use the gold_screwdriver_1 to fix the loose patchbay_1.
Find the silver, Universal Audio branded preamp that is broken and use the gold_screwdriver_1 to repair it.
